card-desc:
Here is an example of your xp card. You can enter the command `profile card <style>` to change the style
*Your xp card will only refresh when you have won xp*
changed-card: Your xp card now uses the style %{style}
changed-error: Oops, an internal error occurred during the processing of the request. Try again later or contact support.
config_list:
List of available options: %{options}

Use the `help profile config` command for more details
invalid-card: This style is invalid. Here is the list of styles you can use: %{cards}
list-cards: Here is the list of available rank cards for you: %{cards}
missing-attach-files: Oops, I"m missing the permission to Attach Files :confused:

animated_card.false: Your xp card won't be animated even if you use an animated avatar (faster rendering)
animated_card.true: Your xp card will be animated when you have an animated avatar (slower rendering)

auto_unafk.false: You must remove the AFK tag yourself
auto_unafk.true: I'll remove the AFK tag from you as soon as you send a message

show_tips.false: You will no longer receive tips from the bot
show_tips.true: You will casually receive tips from the bot

usernames_log.false: You have disabled the recording of your user names and nicknames
usernames_log.true: You have authorized the recording of your user names and nicknames
